oprojekcie.updatetekst: A new version of Oversee Systems is available!
oprojekcie.modal_tytul2: Log in to the Oversee Systems
oprojekcie.oprojekcietekst:
Oversee project is a free tool that allows you to catalog and manage any objects, for example, in your school, business or home.

Oversee Systems is based on QR codes, so we can have easy and quick access to any information about any item in the database.
